showerReviews.reviewText: … worse and worse. I tried to reserve a shower app blocked me for no reason my co driver tried with his own phone same thing BLOCKED. lady at the counter RUDE a not trying to help anyone and asking 17$ for shower. I hope they teach …

I stopped in last evening 02/26/24.    I fueled and showered.   The place was clean, all eight showers were available.    The shower was clean, fully functional, and had excellent water pressure.   The fuel pumps were all functional.   Ther …

… and friendly. The evening staff not so much. You can't even shower in the evening as according to the guy working he has no one to clean them even though there was another person working cleaning. How do you expect to stay in business as a …

They desrve 0 star  Hudson,WI  the  worst customer communication service. I fuel park my Truck trying to get shower, get the shower ticket, the desk personal said showers are not useable due to not having staff to clean. …

Came to shower in truck. Showers had nice hot water and great pressure. Towels are provided and small bar of soap. Didn't use towels as they aren't soft (brought my own). Was very clean however the double toilet paper dispenser was …

Tried to shower on Saturday (10/21) night at 9pm  and was told there were no showers till 7 am because no one was going to clean them. They were nice enough to let me drop my trailer to go to the FlyingJ and take one. Then, on Sunday (10/22 …

… place, restaurant was closed already yesterday evening pretty early, just cold sandwiches.   This morning went to get my shower, and my number came up with no shower.  Waited way too long (about an hour) before I wandered down the hall …
As an over the road trucker my spouse and I park at many truck stops; this TA was clean and the shower room was very clean and spacious. We will stop again.

We stayed here for our ten hour break while passing thru the area .We washed clothes ate supper at the restaurant there and took a shower there. Really friendly staff and the food was really good also ,clean showers, and clean laundry room …

showerReviews.reviewText: My son and I hauled a truck to Barron to sell and we just needed a place to stay. The rooms are clean, beds are comfortable and the owner was nice.  I was just what we needed.

For a basic motel/hotel with great rates, this place was one of my favorites. I had a wonderful stay and will definitely be back! Owner was very friendly, courteous and welcoming. The Room though a little dated, was very clean with fresh …

My wife and i always stay at mom and pop type motels, never chain hotels The" Stop On Inn " we both agree is likely the nicest one we can recall in years of traveling. It was very clean and the rooms are large and comfortable. The grounds around the motel were spacious and well cared for. We will definitely stop here again.

showerReviews.reviewText: First off, as a truck driver, it took 4 hours to get a shower! …

… much better. Staff standing around on their phones while drivers are waiting. Waited 3 hours for a shower and finally asked for a refund, as did 7 other drivers. Not only is the parking lot dirty, so is the inside. There was absolutely …
rude staff, You have to wait more than an hour for a shower. …

I can't complain about the food. But the shower issue needs to be addressed. Apparently you can purchase a shower on the app but these guys were letting people in first come first serve. I thought no one was cleaning the showers for a …

To take a shower here, you have to wait 3 or 4 hours because there are two types of lines: one through the screen, by order, and another where the workers call people as they see fit—or those who pay them. So there end up being two separate …

"Three staff members were standing there to assist only two customers, while we waited for someone to clean the shower rooms for almost 2 hours. no options food here.                                              "Here, you can see the dirty …

Never come here. You wont get a shower. You wont get decent food. You wont get an answer if you call. This is the absolute worst pilot. -5 stars if possible. Ive been otr 3 years and have tried this place now a 3rd time, still horrible. Wou …

… , half the pumps for big trucks are broken. The shower workers reek of weed and while you're showering you'll be serenade by raunchy shit music thumping to a level you can feel 8n the walls. Oh and in the video the shower doesn't shut off …

I have been here since 1200, the shower line hasn’t moved by two people since I got here and logged in for a shower. 12 head now 10 in 4 hours?! I take at MOST 40 minutes to shower and shave. The math isn’t mathing.

For 20h only 15 showers past. This is disrespectful! First shift do something but second sift on April 20. And about the showers I was 3rd in line in 7this morning and now is 10 and I still didn’t got my shower. …

showerReviews.reviewText: … We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A …

… has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our …

… entertainment. There’s a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn’t get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There’s also …

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. …

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that …

… of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized …

World’s biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station …

This place is huge. There’s a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There’s also tesla …
… You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. …

… and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

One older lady always tells my fiance and I we leave a mess when dinner in the shower We don't leave any towels or wash clothes on the floor We always put our things in the hamper!! Charging for two shower when we use it at the same time …
